Statistics Preprocessing¶

” Statistics data evaluation module.

port_risk.preprocessing.statistics.compute_statistics(data: Series, tested_functions: dict, f_name: str) → dict¶

Computes the statistical hypothesis Kolmogorov-Smirnow test for the given data and distributions to test and plots the corresponding Q-Q plot.

Parameters:
data: pd.Series

The data for which we seek the best fitting distribution.

tested_functions: dict

A dictionnary containing the distributions to test and their name.

Return:
statistics: dict

A dictionnary mapping the name of each distribution to the results of the test.
